snippet: Governor Christie noted that many federal investigations, like the one underway about the politically motivated traffic jams in Fort Lee, fizzle out.
abstract: Jim Dwyer's About New York column on New Jersey Gov Chris Christie's news conference apologizing for politically-motivated traffic snarl near George Washington Bridge; says contrition was entirely for sins of others, with Christie noting, perhaps hopefully, that many federal investigations fizzle out.
lead_paragraph: Governor Christie noted that many federal investigations, like the one underway about the politically motivated traffic jams in Fort Lee, fizzle out.

headline.main: Christie’s Apology for the Sins of His Aides and Appointees Leaves Out His Own
headline.print_headline: Christie’s Apology for the Sins of His Aides and Appointees Leaves Out His Own
